topic.title: Zentachain a blockchain company for communication diffrent to zeronet?
topic.body: Zentachain has the same idea but my question what is the diffrents between Zeronet and Zentachain is they looks like same did have Zeronet it own Blockchain?

1587842259_17Y99cco6a5zgT4jbUXbh1ghnc9SP.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2078_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): ZeroNet doesn't use a blockchain.

What is used of the Zeronet is it like IPFS?

> [styromaniac](#comment_2079_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): It's most compared to IPFS, but still has many differences.

Thank you so much can i ask you litle more which one is more secure the Tor-network or Zeronet of the privacy

> [styromaniac](#comment_2080_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You can use them together.

okay so the whole network of Zeronet is decentralized and if am not much trusting of the network i can add the tor-network but it is not a must i am true or wrong?

> [styromaniac](#comment_2081_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Right. Tor is not required to run ZeroNet, but grants more privacy. If you want utmost privacy, then use tor browser.

Thank you so much for investing your time it's priceless I send you a big hug.

> [anshorei](#comment_89_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): ZeroNet provides decentralization without anonymization. [...]

Thank you so much!
